data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Toscana, Italy.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Toscana, Italy
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Over 18.67 percent of the people of Toscana are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Toscana, Italy.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Toscana, Italy to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 54,335 believers in Toscana, Italy how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Italian-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Toscana, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Toscana, Italy.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Toscana, Italy has a population of 3,730,100.

We estimate Toscana has 54,335 people who might know Jesus, 2,979,492 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 696,273 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Toscana that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
